mapper.select:
select count(*) from gibu_fund
category = #{category}
and
fund_name like '%' || #{word} || '%'

select fund_no fundno, fund_name fundname, proposal, homepage, cur_sum cursum, goal_sum goalsum, participant, to_char(start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as startdate, to_char(due_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as duedate, content, hits, category, nullif(cur_sum,0)/goal_sum*100 as progress, source from gibu_fund where fund_no=#{value}
mapper.insert:
select gibu_fund_seq.nextval from dual
insert into gibu_fund (fund_no,fund_name,proposal,homepage,goal_sum,start_date,due_date,content,category, source) values(#{fundNo},#{fundName},#{proposal},#{homepage},#{goalSum},#{startDate},#{dueDate},#{content},#{category},#{source})
mapper.update: update gibu_fund set hits=hits+1 where fund_no=#{value}
update gibu_fund set cur_sum=cur_sum+#{curSum}*100 where fund_no=#{fundNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from gibu_fund_comment where fund_no=#{fundNo}
select photo_no photono, org_name orgname, real_name realname, fund_no fundno from fund_photo where fund_no = #{value}
